name: Phantom of the Opera Revival
location: Broadway Theater, New York City, NY
short_description: The timeless story returns to Broadway with a new cast and production.
long_description: Witness the enchanting tale of love, mystery, and music as Phantom of the Opera returns to the stage. This revival features a stellar cast and breathtaking production that will captivate audiences of all ages.
return_policy_specifics: Refundable up to 14 days before the event.
